comment:
A kind-hearted person, always ready to help and bring discomfort 😊. 
Your exciting life keeps us curious and motivated to see what's new on your WhatsApp and other apps 😅.
Your enthusiasm always inspires us to organize trips and adventures, hope you carry this energy with you throughout your life!
name: Arvind Tomar

comment:
you were one of the first few friends I had during online semester. Always full of enthusisasm no matter how the situation is !  you made my boring life really exciting during my stay at IIT .  May you always keep smiling like this 
😊
name: Arvind Yadav

comment:
Bhai koi IITI ko Jane na Jane, Aisa koi nhi hai Jo teko nhi janta.
Abhi bhi yaad hai hostel me pehla Banda tu hi Mila tha apne signature outfit me.
Abhi ka count bta de yaar🙃
Team lead(Tech Titans dot dot)
Epsilon(One and only)
Leader of chims
name: Chaitanya

comment: I met you in Quarentine when I can't even understand simple words in Hindi. But even now I don't understand some of your words 😂😂. Thoda dheere dheere baat karna is my fav line talking to you 😅. I miss those bhojpuri songs while bathing. All the best vro..
name: Lohith Reddy

comment: Instagram IITI ka brand ambassador, Sabse jyada helping nature wala Banda but multi-tasking harkate toda jyada hai
name: Likhith Raj DV

comment: Tere ke confidence ka daat deta hu. Bhai ne sikhaya ki haath marte rehna important hai jab tak manzil pe pohoch nahi jaye. Online mei meets, ek dusre ki sahayata, projects, intern, plans bohot sare par...theek hai chalte hai. Milte hai Hyderabad mei.
name: Shaik Wanhar Aziz

comment: Apne Bhai ki hansiii se poora auditorium goonj jaata hai...very calm and cool Banda .... Ladki kaise pta leta hai bhai tu?? Mujhe bhi seekha dena... Aur apne randwe room mates ko to jarur sikha dena
name: Manav Kumar Sinha

comment: You were the first person I interacted with on campus. I enjoyed trying to guess where you were adventuring based on your WhatsApp status. Still guessing your profile pic🤔.
name: Amit Kumar Makkad

comment: RAM RAM BHAIWA! Bhai is very simple and kind. Always feel Ghar-Waali feeling talking to you... Ready to help anytime, All the best for your future life, enjoy more of cycle rides and keep on suggesting the good places to me, or maybe lets go together.
name: Abhinav Yadav

comment: A traveller who is always travelling and because of whom I have done very unexpected and unplanned journeys. Bas ye batao har mahine ghumne ka plan banane ki energy kaha se laate ho app😂. Kind-heart and polite to nahi bolunga😅 but you are really a good person to be around and amazing friend. ATB!
name: Viral S Rathod

comment: Kaafi saaf Dil hai bhai tera❤️Never loose your innocence..All the best for your future✌️
name: Devesh Jindal

comment: Oye banarasi paan, jab bhi aata hai flat me shor karke jata hai
name: Puneet Gupta

comment: A hard working person who always greets with a smile. UP ki shaan apna Abhishek jaiswal. Hyderabad me milte hain bhai 🙌. All the best!
name: Aditya Handa

comment: A cool dude to summarize in one word. 😎 Jab bhi milte ho UP ki vibe aa jati hai. 🚗 If you want to go on an unplanned trip, he is the first person who will join you. 🌟 Aise hi hamesha muskurate rehna bhai. 😄
name: Mayank Tayal

comment: Bhai ko jab free time milta h ghoomne nikal jaata aur sbse phle status daal deta 😂. Hamesha chill and relax but not before vivas and exams😂. Best of luck  bro for future endeavors
name: Dishesh Singh Chaudhary

comment: Always smiling and positive, a good person and even better friend. Keep in touch and keep shining, abhishek
name: Nilay Ganvit

comment: A happy person with a pure heart... Can't forget the moments we shared... Bhojpuri songs, chicken dinner, cycling, and yeah bakchodis... Lots more to come 🤓
name: Jitendra Kumar

comment: Bhai Jai Shree Ram !! , Tu banda great hai mila thoda late hai. Dil se saaf and full U.P. guy. Bhai tum hi ho jisse mai sabse jyada relate kara tha intern season ke time :). All the best for your future !!
name: Anurag Agarwal

comment: Hii Abhi! Thank you for being an integral part of this incredible journey..Life is a beautiful journey so live each day with fervour and purpose, never change urself to fit someone else's mold. Stay true to who you are, for that is where your strength and beauty lie. All the best and stay connected.
name: Pragya

comment: Hey Jaiswal! May your websites be as functional as your favorite travel app, and may your bugs be rarer than a unicorn. Keep coding and conquering the digital world, one byte at a time! The tech world ain't ready for your awesomeness! Wishing you all the best for your future endeavors, UP boy!
name: Trupti U Rathod

comment: Hamesha energy sai bhara rehta hai bhai🫡. ATB for your future Bhai...
name: Rahul Raut

comment: A very "chill" person I met here. Filled with enthusiasm, joy and cheer, for those like us, who stayed with him for some time.
name: Md Zaeem

comment: Hey Abhishek ! Wish you all the very best for the upcoming new chapter in the professional world ! working with you on the BTP project was a good experience ! Keep shining god bless!
name: Shekhar Tyagi

comment: You're the epitome of chill, always radiating fun vibes. Never change, my friend. 🌟😎
name: Parth Bhore

comment: Chill and lovely guy who's always ready to hold a conversation. Only ever had positive and energy filled conversations with him. Bro has some really interesting stories to tell about his adventures 😁. Let's keep in touch.
name: Umang Jain
